elementlist.def: initial particle, familiar prefix to name such as %u963F%u6241 for Chen Shui-Bian %u9673%u6C34%u6241|%u9648%u6C34%u6241[Chen2 Shui3 bian3] or Dad %u963F%u7239[a1 die1], used as phonetic A in transliteration, abbr. for Afghanistan %u963F%u5BCC%u6C57 :: (phonetic character) :: (final particle expressing approval or doubt), (interjection equivalent to punctuating sentence with "you see") :: flatter
